items.content: Small steps still move you forward.
items.author: Prody Wisdom
items.reflectionPrompt: What small step can you take today?

items.content: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
items.author: Albert Einstein
items.reflectionPrompt: What opportunity is hidden in your challenge?

items.content: Wherever you are, be all there.
items.author: Jim Elliot
items.reflectionPrompt: How will you return to this moment?
